strings.str: Confirmation of request for cancellation of blocking
Subject: Confirmation of request for cancellation of blocking of
I hereby confirm the request for cancellation of the blocking of the change of the sponsoring registrar of the
submitted through the web form at the association webpages
, and I request the cancellation of the specified blocking option.
Name and officially authenticated signature of authorised person:
Please print this request, sign it (a notarized signature required) and send the signed original to the following address:
Signatories whose name is not listed in the Central registry of domain names must attach
an original or a notarized copy of a document authorizing them to perform the relevant request.
